title: Pangoling Game engine
short_description: current project to create a simple 3D game engine. Project is still very much work in progress and due to its nature this is unlikely to change anytime soon

title: Nosville
short_description: A fully functional help request tool where users could ask and receive help to their requests

title: CityWe
short_description: A digital multiplayer card game where players create their own city district by means of playing cards

title: AR Math education
short_description: Worked together in a cooperation between VUB and Lulea University developing a story focused educational game that also utilzed AR techniques to teach some basic math topics to elementary students

title: Truebiters
short_description: A digital educational game intended for teaching basics of learning about booleans. The game also had a multiplayer game over bluetooth. The game was functional and made available on Android and IOS stores

title: Minerva
short_description: An adaptive educational game that changed depending on players learning and play styles

title: Running Othello 2
short_description: An educational take on Running Othello game where players make their moves on NFC tags placed on the ground. The player would need to solve an educational task before they could take another move. The game supports 2 player game over two separate gameboards

title: Zombie Slayer
short_description: A simple enemy wave game where player must survive as long as possible. The pixel art was created by myself

title: Leometry AR
short_description: A simple educational game built for Android platform that also utilized AR for launching certain ingame events

title: Website
short_description: I created a simple homepage for the golden divers dive shop in Thailand
